title: Nerf Ekko
body: So i played vayne, and there was an Ekko, and he literally one shot me with his e, is there even a counter for him? You cant even kite him, or cant use qss or ga, because hes just gonna pop you still, you would think riot could make a balanced champion for once.

replies.body: Keko is fine where he is, learn the champions weaknesses and use ur champion against them, exploit them ekko is easy for quite a champ also I bet u BARD CAN ACTUALLY DO SOMETHING AGAINST HIM and against everything for that matter
